org.springframework.test.web.client.response

类 DefaultResponseCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.test.web.client.response.DefaultResponseCreator
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ResponseCreator

    public class DefaultResponseCreator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResponseCreator
    A ResponseCreator with builder-style methods for adding response details.
    从以下版本开始:
    3.2
    作者:
    Rossen Stoyanchev
